metadata.title: CVE-2022-41218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In drivers/media/dvb-core/dmxdev.c in the Linux kernel through 5.19.10,there is a use-after-free caused by refcount races, affectingdvb_demux_open and dvb_dmxdev_release.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
